channel.title: ASVS requirements on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in ASVS requirements on Open Security Summit

item.title: What OWASP tools/projects we already have and what are we missing to deliver secure devops pipelines
item.description: Notable logs from the chat during the session 16:19:55 From Francesco Cipollone : Owen from OWASP did some benchmarking for us 16:20:08 From Francesco Cipollone : if you reach out to grant Ongers he might be able to share 16:20:16 From Francesco Cipollone : @dominik 16:30:33 From Niels H : Bill of Material of your software might contain cloud SDKs 16:37:59 From Daniel C : https://github.com/actions 16:38:32 From Daniel C : https://github.
